articles.author: Alan Yuhas
articles.title: Airstrike That Killed Suleimani Also Killed Powerful Iraqi Militia Leader
articles.description: Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, a lifelong ally of Iran, was the Iraqi deputy commander of the group overseeing militias, and long at odds with the United States.
articles.content:
Much of Mr. al-Muhandiss history remains murky, including his exact age: He would have been about 66 or 67 at the time of his death, according to the United States government, which has said he was born in 1953 in Basra, Iraq.
